mapper.sql: c_id, c_user_id, c_count, c_book_id, c_price, c_all, c_mark
mapper.select: select c_id AS "id", c_count AS "cCount", c_book_id AS "cBookId" , c_price AS "cPrice", c_all AS "cAll", c_mark AS "bMark" ,c_all AS "cAll", b.b_name AS "name",b.b_price AS "singalPrice" ,b.b_pic AS "img",b.b_introduce AS "goodTip" from b_shop_cart LEFT JOIN b_book b ON b.b_id = c_book_id where c_user_id = #{cUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into b_shop_cart (c_id, c_user_id, c_count, c_book_id, c_price, c_all, c_mark) values (#{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cBookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into b_shop_cart
c_id,
c_user_id,
c_count,
c_book_id,
c_price,
c_all,
c_mark,

mapper.update:
update b_shop_cart
c_user_id = #{cUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_count = #{cCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_book_id = #{cBookId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_price = #{cPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
c_all = #{cAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
c_mark = #{cMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update b_shop_cart set c_user_id = #{cUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_count = #{cCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_book_id = #{cBookId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_price = #{cPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, c_all = #{cAll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, c_mark = #{cMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
